title: Parameters
description: Parameters measuring the size of set families

columns.name: short_name
columns.description: Short identifier for cross-referencing between tables

columns.name: comments
columns.description: Additional comments or notes about the parameter

columns.name: category
columns.description: Category or classification of the parameter

columns.name: symmetric
columns.description: Whether the parameter is symmetric, i.e. invariant under complementation

columns.name: monotonic
columns.description: Whether the parameter is monotonic, i.e. non-decreasing with respect to set inclusion
